teamMembers.name: Mark Hazleton
teamMembers.title: Technology Director & Founder
teamMembers.subtitle: Control Origins & Project Mechanics
teamMembers.description: Mark Hazleton brings over two decades of technology leadership experience, currently serving as Senior Manager of Application Development at Baylor Scott & White Health. As founder of Control Origins and Project Mechanics, Mark bridges economic insights with cutting-edge technology solutions, specializing in web development, cloud architecture, and data analytics.

teamMembers.name: Dr. Jared Hazleton
teamMembers.title: Lead Economist
teamMembers.subtitle: Economic Analysis & Research
teamMembers.description: Dr. Jared Hazleton is a renowned economist with extensive experience in economic analysis and commentary, specializing in Texas economic trends, regional development, and market forecasting. His research focuses on understanding the dynamics of state and local economies, with particular expertise in the Texas economic landscape.
